PROGRAMMES/COURSES AVAILABLE AT THE NIGERIA CERTIFICATE IN EDUCATION (NCE) LEVEL AND THE REQUIREMENTS FOR EACH 
COURSE  
COLLEGE/COURSE  COURSE REQUIREMENTS  UTME SUBJECTS  
WARRI-COE_COE  
YEWA  
ZING  
ZUBA  
  
  
  
SOCIAL STUDIES/FINE ART  
OTTO/IJANIKIN   
  
  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Fine Arts, Government/History, one 
(1)   Social Science/Arts subject.  
  
Fine Art, Government/History, one (1)Arts/Social 
Science subject.  
  
SOCIAL STUDIES/CREATIVE ARTS  
  
COE-BILLIRI  
FC-ZARIA  
 WARRI-COE_COE    
  
As in Social Studies/Fine Arts.  
  
As in Social Studies/Fine Arts.  
  
SPECIAL EDUCATION/ADULT AND NON  
FORMAL EDUCATION  
FCS-OYO  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics and three (3) subjects.  
  
English Language and any three (3) subjects.  
  
SPECIAL EDUCATION/EARLY CHILDHOOD  
CARE  EDUCATION  
FCS-OYO  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics and three (3)   subjects.  
  
English Language and any three (3) subjects.  
  
SPECIAL EDUCATION/AGRICULTURAL  
SCIENCE (DOUBLE MAJOR)  
  
FCS-OYO  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, 
Mathematics, Agricultural Science and any two (2)  
of the following:  
1. Chemistry       2. Geography.  3. Physics      4. 
Health Science/Biology   5. Mathematics.     6. 
Physical  Health Education.  
  
Agricultural Science and any two (2) of Chemistry, 
Geography, Physics, General Science Mathematics 
and Biology.
